thread.title: Heart Makeup: 5 Ways to Pull It Off for Valentine's Day
thread.title_full: Heart Makeup: 5 Ways to Pull It Off for Valentine's Day

title: Heart Makeup: 5 Ways to Pull It Off for Valentine's Day
text: February 7, 2017 Kylie Jenner/Instagram You don't have to have an S.O. to grace your face with heart makeup for Valentine's Day this year. No matter what your plans are for February 14, you can take inspiration from popular beauty bloggers. Instagram-famous makeup artists like Kristen Leanne, Lauren Elyse , and Jkissa posted some major inspo on their feeds lately, and we couldn't ignore the overwhelmingly festive trend. Kylie Jenner even tried out the look for the Kylie Cosmetic Valentine's Day Collection campaign. TBH heart makeup speaks to the elementary schooler in us that lived for handing out handmade Valentines to our classmates and our current love for experimenting with makeup. (Shout out to purple highlighter .) Of course, makeup can be occasionally over the top on Instagram, so we rounded up our some of favorite looks that are easiest to pull off. All you need is the Milk Makeup Black Heart Tattoo Stamp (or Flirt Cosmetic's Chicers , if you prefer something more temporary), some heart-shaped stickers, or a felt-tipped liquid eyeliner in the color of your choice.
